means: 宣扬（某事物）( promulgate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: A new constitution was promulgated last month.
sentence.Network_cn: 上个月颁布了一部新宪法。

sentence.Network_en: Hence China has promulgated more than 30 relevant laws, statutes and regulations.
sentence.Network_cn: 中国为此颁布的法律 、 法规和规章多达30余项.

sentence.Network_en: The shipping industry promulgated a voluntary code.
sentence.Network_cn: 航运业对自律守则进行了宣传。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The country ' s new tax regulations promulgated , but also to encourage technological progress ., 国家新消费税法规的出台 , 也是为了鼓励技术进步.
A set of such ordinances , especially those promulgated by Charlemagne and his successors ., 法典或法令汇编一套这样的法规 , 尤指由查理大帝及其继承者所颁的.
This Circular is promulgated on December 20 , 2005 ., 本通知于 2005年 12月 20日发布实施.
National Environmental Protection Bureau promulgated and carried out non - polluted EIA in 1998 ., 国家环境保护总局于 1998年正式颁布实施非污染生态影响评价.

list.abs: The federal government promulgated the Clean Water Act and the Clean Air Act ., 联邦政府颁布了水清洁法 > 和空气清洁法 >.
the head of undertaking take promulgates the honored guest status attendance promulgation ceremony party and issues medal , the awarding cup as prize enterprise ;企业领导以颁奖嘉宾身份出席颁奖典礼晚会并为获奖企业颁发奖牌、奖杯；
双语词汇 ... 秘书长 secretary-general to the president 公布法律 promulgate laws 发布命令 issue mandates.

to deal with the " national six " rules promulgated and implemented , Chengdu some 90 square-development flows along the Great Huxing prices surging , and some even have begun covert sale price .为应对“国六条”及实施细则出台，成都部分楼盘90平方米以上的大户型涨价潮暗流涌动，一些楼盘甚至已开始变相涨价。

entry.def: If people promulgate a new law or a new idea, they make it widely known.

example.ex: The shipping industry promulgated a voluntary code.
example.tran: 航运业对自律守则进行了宣传。

entry.def: If a new law is promulgated by a government or national leader, it is publicly approved or made official.

example.ex: A new constitution was promulgated last month.
example.tran: 上个月颁布了一部新宪法。

auth_sentence.content: This kind of propaganda is promulgated by those who have an axe to grind.
auth_sentence.res_content: This kind of propaganda is promulgated by those who have an axe to grind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This kind of propaganda is promulgated by those who have an axe to grind.

auth_sentence.content: Universal adult suffrage introduced; new constitution providing for a popularly-elected House of Representatives promulgated.
auth_sentence.res_content: Universal adult suffrage introduced; new constitution providing for a popularly-elected House of Representatives promulgated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Universal adult suffrage introduced; new constitution providing for a popularly-elected House of Representatives promulgated.
